page.title: 14The Bell Inn - Salhouse 2
page.content:
Beer for the Bell Inn was until very recently, supplied by The Norwich Brewery Company and was brewed in that city.The brewery has now closed with the loss of jobs and beer is now supplied from Manchester and London.The Norwich Brewery signs will stay on the Inn until 1988. Like all good publicans, Mr Colman runs a trouble-free inn and reserves the right to refuse entry.He is unable to refuse entry to one 'person' and that is the Inn's ghost who, apart from a thud or two in the night, can be heard playing darts at 6 o'clock in the morning.
report by Jon-Erik Stubbings and Paul Edwards
